title: Calling You
description: This unique, beautifully drawn collection of stories examines the hidden truths behind what makes us truly human. In this manga, a girl creates a cell phone in her imagination, from which she can communicate with others... A young boy discovers his new friend has the power to heal others-and learns about true friendship and sacrifice... The healing power of love confronts the tragedy and horror of a deadly train accident.
author: Setsuri Tsuzuki
